name: Reactor Overdrive
description: Removes '==unnecessary==' safety locks from the ships flux grid. This will put the reactor under more stress in exchange for a higher flux throughput.
secondaryStatValues: 10, 20, true, false _ -10, -20, true, false _ 15, 30, false, false

name: Hardened Plating
description: Strengthens the ships external armor plating

name: Shaped Charges
description: Modifies the internal forge of the ship to produce ammunition with ==improved anti-armor== capabilities.

name: Improved Capacitors
description: Increases the damage output of energy based weapons.

name: Modulating Shield Emitters
description: Reduces the overall damage taken by shields.
secondaryStatValues: -20, -30, true, false _ -15, -25, false, false _ -20, -30, false, false

name: Flux Injector
description: Reroutes some of the ships generated flux back into its system for a small boost.
primaryStatValues: 20, 30, true, false _ 1, 2, false, false _ -20, -30, false, false
secondaryStatValues: 1, 1, false, false _ 10, 15, true, false _ -10, -15, true, false

name: Improved Fighter Hull
description: Reprograms the internal LPC forges to add additional hull plating to all fighters and drones manufactured by this carrier.
primaryStatValues: 20, 30, true, false _ -20, -30, true, false _ -20, -30, true, false

name: Improved Fighter Thrusters
description: Reprograms the internal LPC forges to increase the speed of all fighters and drones manufactured by this carrier.

name: Temporal Accelerator
description: Generates a temporal field inside the ship, accelerating time flow on board.
secondaryStatValues: 7.5, 15, true, false _ 7.5, 15, true, false _ 7.5, 15, true, false _ -30, -60, false, false

name: Custom Plume Colorizer
description: Want to impress your opposing fleet commander? Try the all new '==Exhaust Colorizer==' for your ship and make him think about all the wrong decisions he made when fitting his ship, only to get vaporized by a Reaper-Torpedo mere seconds later."
additionalDescription: Makes your engine flames change to your ==specified color==.

name: Rainbow Engines
description: Bored of those static and dull engine flames? Try the all new '==Rainbow Fuel Addition==' for your ship and kiss those boring exhausts goodbye!
additionalDescription: Makes your engine flames change color over time.

name: Rainbow Shields
description: Bored of always looking at that static and dull barrier in front of your ship? Try the all new '==Rainbow Crystal Shield Matrix==' and kiss those boring visuals goodbye!
additionalDescription: Makes your shield change color over time.

name: Pursuit Engines
description: Refits the ship to excel at pursuing enemies during combat. Suffers from drawbacks when traveling in hyperspace.
primaryStatMods: ZERO_FLUX_SPEED, SHIP_ACCELERATION, SHIP_TURN, BURN_LEVEL, FUEL_USE, ARMOR_HEALTH
primaryStatValues: 30, 50, true, false _ 20, 40, true, false _ 20, 40, true, false _ -1, -2, false, false _ 30, 50, true, true _ -10, -15, true, true

name: Travel Drives
description: Refits the ship for traveling long distances in hyperspace. Serious drawbacks when engaged during combat.
primaryStatMods: BURN_LEVEL, FUEL_USE, SENSOR_PROFILE, ZERO_FLUX_SPEED, SHIP_MAX_SPEED, ENGINE_HEALTH
primaryStatValues: 2, 4, false, false _ -30, -45, true, false _ -15, -25, true, false _ -30, -50, false, false _ -10, -20, true, true _ -15, -25, true, true

augmentID:
# NOTES:
A list of all Slot-Types, StatMods and Qualities can be found in VoidTec\help\DataTypes.txt

manufacturer:
# Manufacturer - Required
Can be a faction or custom entry.
Will color the entry in faction-, designType- or playercolor
name: # Displayed name of the Augment  - Required
rarity:
# Rarity  - Required
100 highest spawn chance
1 lowest spawn chance
primaryStatMods:
# Primary stat modifiers
MOD1, MOD2, MOD3...
primaryStatValues:
# Values used for each primary stat
needs to be grouped as follow:
minValueInt, maxValueInt, modifiedByQualityBoolean, invertModifier _ minValueInt, maxValueInt, modifiedByQualityBoolean, invertModifier _ ...
secondarySlots:
# Secondary slots
Can be more than one
SLOT1, SLOT2, SLOT3, ...
secondaryStatMods:
# Secondary stat modifiers
MOD1, MOD2, MOD3, ...
secondaryStatValues:
# Values used for each secondary stat
needs to be grouped as follow:
minValueInt, maxValueInt, modifiedByQualityBoolean, invertModifier _ minValueInt, maxValueInt, modifiedByQualityBoolean, invertModifier _ ...
uniqueMod: # each slot category can only house a single unique mod
allowedAugmentQualities:
# Allowed qualities which can be rolled
MIN_QUALITY, MAX_QUALITY
ONLY_QUALITY
equalQualityRoll: # If true, will pick a random quality and ignore its weighting
allowedFactions: # Faction IDs which are allowed to use them. If empty, everyone will get access to it
additionalDescription: # Description which gets added after the listed augment stats
beforeCreationScript:
# Path to the script which fires before ship creation.
Needs to implement de.schafunschaf.voidtec.combat.vesai.BeforeCreationEffect
afterCreationScript:
# Path to the script which fires after ship creation.
Needs to implement de.schafunschaf.voidtec.combat.vesai.AfterCreationEffect
combatScript:
# Path to the script which runs every frame in combat.
Needs to implement de.schafunschaf.voidtec.combat.vesai.CombatScriptRunner
rightClickScript:
# Path to script which gets fired when right-clicking an augment in your cargo.
Needs to implement de.schafunschaf.voidtec.combat.vesai.RightClickAction
